sen.j: 久美浜駅（くみはまえき）は、京都府京丹後市久美浜町にある、北近畿タンゴ鉄道(KTR)北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Kumihama-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture, Kumihama Station is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by the Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Kumihama Station, located in Kumihama-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by the Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Kumihama Station, located in Kumihama-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by the Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).

sen.j: 特別急行列車「タンゴエクスプローラー」・「タンゴディスカバリー」を含め、全列車が停車する。
sen.e: All trains stop at this station, including Limited Express 'Tango Explorer' and Limited Express 'Tango Discovery.'
All trains stop at this station, including the 'Tango Explorer' and 'Tango Discovery' limited express trains.
All trains stop at this station, including the 'Tango Explorer' and 'Tango Discovery' limited express trains.

sen.j: 2007年3月18日の西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）及びKTRのダイヤ改正までは、これらの特急の多くが当駅発着となっていた。
sen.e: Before the schedule revision of March 18, 2007 for the West Japan Railway Company (JR West) and the KTR, many of these Limited Express trains would arrive at and depart from this station.
Before the schedule revision of March 18, 2007 for the West Japan Railway Company (JR West) and the KTR, many of these limited express trains would arrive at and depart from this station.
Before the schedule revision of March 18, 2007 for the West Japan Railway Company (JR West) and the KTR, many of these limited express trains would arrive at and depart from this station.

sen.j: 現在は、豊岡駅発着となっている。
sen.e: At present, the Limited Express trains arrive at and depart from Toyooka Station.
Currently, the limited express trains arrive at and depart from Toyooka Station.
Currently, the limited express trains arrive at and depart from Toyooka Station.

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 島式・相対式2面3線のプラットホームを持つ地上駅である。
sen.e: Kumihama Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms (including an island platform) serving three tracks.
Kumihama Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms (including an island platform) serving three tracks.
Kumihama Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms (including an island platform) serving three tracks.

sen.j: 駅舎は、1871年に廃藩置県が行われた際に設置された久美浜県の県庁舎をモデルにしたもので、「メモリアルゲート久美浜」の愛称で親しまれている。
sen.e: The station building was built based on the prefectural office building of Kumihama Prefecture, which was established by Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures) in 1871, and has been fondly referred to as the 'Memorial Gate Kumihama.'

The station building was built based on the prefectural office building of Kumihama Prefecture, which was established by Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures) in 1871, and has been fondly referred to as the 'Memorial Gate Kumihama.'

The station building was built based on the prefectural office building of Kumihama Prefecture, which was established by Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures) in 1871, and has been fondly referred to as the 'Memorial Gate Kumihama.'

sen.j: また、日曜日の朝には、駅舎内で朝市が行われ、賑わっている。
sen.e: A morning market is held in the station building on Sunday morning and is full with people.
A morning market is held in the station building on Sunday mornings, at which time the station is crowded with people.
A morning market is held in the station building on Sunday mornings, at which time the station is crowded with people.

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 京丹後市役所久美浜庁舎（旧・久美浜町役場）
sen.e: Kyotango City Hall, Kumihama government office (old Kumihama Town Office)
Kyotango City Hall, Kumihama government office (the old Kumihama Town Office)
Kyotango City Hall, Kumihama government office (the old Kumihama Town Office)

sen.j: 京丹後市立久美浜小学校
京丹後市立久美浜中学校
sen.e: Kyotango City Kumihama Junior High School
Kyotango City Kumihama Junior High School
Kyotango Municipal Kumihama Junior High School

sen.j: 京都北都信用金庫久美浜支店
sen.e: Kyoto Hokuto Shinkin Bank Kumihama Branch
Kyoto Hokuto Shinkin Bank Kumihama Branch
Kyoto Hokuto Shinkin Bank Kumihama Branch

sen.j: 久美浜シーサイド温泉
当駅から丹後海陸交通バス・京丹後市営バスで「稲葉本家」（土居を改称。）下車。
sen.e: Take the Tango Kairiku Kotsu Bus or Kyotango City Bus from the station for 'Inaba-honke' (old Doi).
Take the Tango Kairiku Kotsu Bus or Kyotango City Bus from the station for 'Inaba-honke' (old Doi).
Take the Tango Kairiku Kotsu Bus or Kyotango City Bus from the station for 'Inaba-honke' (old Doi bus stop).
sen.cmt: Old Doi bus stop と補足しました。

sen.e: Teiki Kanko Bus (a regular tourist bus service)
Teiki Kanko Bus (a regular tourist bus service)

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約123人である。
sen.e: The number of passengers per day in 2006 was about 123.
The average daily number of passengers in 2006 was 123.
The average daily number of passengers in fiscal year 2006 was 123.
sen.cmt: fiscal year を追加しました。

sen.e: (According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistical Book)
(According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 朝、夕は通学生の利用が多く、それ以外の時間は、主に市民が利用している。
sen.e: The station is used generally by commuting students in the morning and evening, and mainly by residents in other times.
The station is generally used by students in the morning and evening, and mainly by residents at other times.
The station is generally used by students in the morning and evening, and mainly by residents at other times.

sen.j: 当駅から京都・大阪方面へは福知山駅などへ出るよりも豊岡駅へ出たほうが早い場合がある。
sen.e: In some cases, it takes shorter to reach Kyoto or Osaka from the station via Toyooka Station than via Fukuchiyama Station etc.
In some cases, it takes less time to reach Kyoto or Osaka from the station via Toyooka Station than via Fukuchiyama Station, etc.
In some cases, it takes less time to reach Kyoto or Osaka from the station via Toyooka Station than via Fukuchiyama Station, etc.

sen.j: 1929年（昭和4年）12月15日 日本国有鉄道峰豊線豊岡～久美浜間開通時に開業。
sen.e: On December 15, 1929 the station was opened when the section between Toyooka and Kumihama on the Minetoyo Line was opened by the Japanese National Railways.
On December 15, 1929, the station was opened when the section between Toyooka and Kumihama on the Minetoyo Line was opened by Japanese National Railways.
December 15, 1929: The station was opened when the section between Toyooka and Kumihama on the Minetoyo Line was opened by Japan National Railways.
sen.cmt: 月日、コロン の表現にしました。

sen.j: 1932年（昭和7年）8月10日 丹後木津（現在の木津温泉駅）～久美浜間開通により、全通。
sen.e: On August 10, 1932 the entire Minetoyo Line was completed by the opening of the section between Tango kitsu Station (the current Kitsuonsen Station) and Kumihama Station.
On August 10, 1932, the entire Minetoyo Line was completed with the opening of the section between Tango Kitsu Station (the current Kitsuonsen Station) and Kumihama Station.
August 10, 1932: The entire Minetoyo Line was completed with the opening of the section between Tango Kitsu Station (the current Kitsu-onsen Station) and Kumihama Station.
sen.cmt: 月日、コロン の表現にしました。

sen.e: The Minetoyo Line was renamed the Miyazu Line.
The Minetoyo Line was renamed as the Miyazu Line.
The Minetoyo Line was renamed as the Miyazu Line.

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）4月1日 国鉄分割民営化により、JR西日本の駅となる。
sen.e: On April 1, 1987 the station came to be owned by the JR West by the division and privatization of the Japan National Railways.
On April 1, 1987, the station came to be owned by JR West due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways.
April 1, 1987: The station came to be owned by JR West due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways.
sen.cmt: 月日、コロン の表現にしました。

sen.j: 1990年（平成2年）4月1日 北近畿タンゴ鉄道への宮津線移管により、同鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: On April 1, 1990 the Miyazu Line was transferred to the Kitakinki Tango Railway, thereby the station came to be owned by the Kitakinki Tango Railway.
On April 1, 1990, the Miyazu Line was transferred to the Kitakinki Tango Railway, whereby the station came to be owned by the Kitakinki Tango Railway.
April 1, 1990: The Miyazu Line was transferred to the Kitakinki Tango Railway, whereby the station came to be owned by the Kitakinki Tango Railway.
sen.cmt: 月日、コロン の表現にしました。
他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 甲山駅 - 久美浜駅 - 但馬三江駅
sen.e: Koyama Station - Kumihama Station - Tajimamie Station
Koyama Station - Kumihama Station - Tajimamie Station
Koyama Station - Kumihama Station - Tajimamie Station
